Key: S-Sorry...
Hurry up.
Hello, Shin. Might you be with Kotori right\nnow?
Huh? Yes. She's with me.
I see. Take your time, but this is an emergency.
An emergency...?
Yes. You see, I've triangulated the location of\nthe enemy.
The enemy...?
Yes... They are at Neo Tengu Tower.

Enemy... Neo Tengu Tower...? Wait a minute!
What are you talking about? Enemy?!
I see. Shin, you must be affected too.
Affected? By what?
Yes. Everyone within the barrier is having their\nmemories distorted. I hadn't thought that both\nyou and Kotori would be affected.
Memories distorted?!
Yes. The monument you mentioned, Shin,\nis the keystone as predicted.
It was?!
The result of our investigation yielded similar\nsignatures from the shrine and the outlet tower\nby the lake.
What?!
At the center of all three points is Neo Tengu\nTower.

N-Neo Tengu Tower is in the center of the
barrier... Is it the base?
Correct. Your memories of it are false,\nbecause that building shouldn't exist in\nTengu City.
WHAT?!
Remember, Shin. You know that something\nhas been off this whole time.
Wh-Whoa!

(That's right. Why have... I forgotten all this
time?)
I remember now. I remember everything.
Ah. Wonderful.

What's the matter, Shido? It's Reine, right?
Give me the phone.
O-Okay.
Hello, Reine? What's going in...?
...What?! No, that can't be...

The enemy... I see. At Neo Tengu Tower?
Okay, got it. No... Thank you.
I remember... everything now.
Kotori...
That's right. There's something I must do.
Shido, I'm going.
H-Hey!

The only Spirit who can fight right now is me.
I've gone on a date with you, and my powers
are stable. But others can't, so I must fight.
But... we don't have to go right this minute.

Reine called you because this is our last
chance. Besides, this is my job. I can't escape.
I hope you understand.
Kotori...
Okay, got it. Then I'm going with you.

Of course not! You can't come. Don't you
know how dangerous it'll be?
Even more reason I can't let you go alone!
Shido...

You can't stop me. I... I'm conquering whatever
fate throws at us!
Man, aren't you something. And so stubborn!
Yup. Sorry, but I'm not budging!
Okay, fine. We'll go together. Into victory.
Got it!
Let's go, Shido!

Neo Tengu Tower... Who would've guessed it
was right under nose the whole time?

Be careful, Shido. There's little we know
about the enemy.

Yeah, but that's even more reason for us
to charge in.

I suppose you've got a point. If we're together,
no matter what happens, I won't regret it.
Bring it on... Here we go, Kotori!
Charge!
Were you in my dreams...?
Are you a Spirit?
No one asked for this ending.
No one... asked?

If only you were content to live in the idyll
contentment I created...
What are you talking about?

Getting strong Spirit readings... She's the
source of everything!

She is? I don't know... I don't think this is
our first time meeting.

I am the ruler of this world, Eden.
If you prefer another name, call me Ruler.

But... telling you is pointless.
I will banish you.
Shido, get back!

Very well. You refuse my mercy. You are weak
and foolish.
Wh-What, my Spirit powers... Wh-Why?!
Kotori!
Shido...
Scatter.
Rrgh... AAAAAAAAAH!
KOTORIIIIII! Damn it! What happened?!

Farewell, Shido Itsuka. I hope for your next
dream to be a happier one.
You promised me... you'd care for Kotori.
